CustomField.description: Only records showing green are open for hiring. Records showing yellow may become open again, but currently are not open.
CustomField.formula: IMAGE( CASE( Status__c , "Open - New", "/img/samples/color_green.gif", "Open - Backfill", "/img/samples/color_green.gif", "Offer in Progress", "/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "Offer Accepted", "/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "Filled", "/img/samples/color_red.gif", "/s.gif"), "status color",15,30)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Only records showing green are open for hiring. Records showing yellow may become open again, but currently are not open.
CustomField.label: Offer Signal
